languages.text: "Да уж, весь день лениво с огнеметом расхаживать да холопов жечь — работенка непыльная. Это тебе не в доках горбатиться за четверть пайка".
"Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."
languages.original_text: "Да уж, весь день лениво с огнеметом расхаживать да холопов жечь — работенка непыльная. Это тебе не в доках горбатиться за четверть пайка".

traits.locale_text: "Yeah, strolling 'round station and burning rabble is a cosy old job. Sure beats breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."
"Yeah, strolling 'round station and burning rabble is a cosy old job. Sure beats breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."
"Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."
"Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."
"Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."

languages.text: “是啊，在这座星站到处巡逻，见人就烧，这种活确实很轻松，总比为了小半份口粮在码头上累死累活强多了。”
languages.original_text: "Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，在这座星站到处巡逻，见人就烧，这种活确实很轻松，总比为了小半份口粮在码头上累死累活强多了。”

languages.text: 「ああ、ステーションの周りをうろついて群衆を燃やして回るなんざ、いい仕事だよなぁ。港で配給の食料のために骨身を削るより全然マシだな」
languages.original_text: "Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、ステーションの周りをうろついて群衆を燃やして回るなんざ、いい仕事だよなぁ。港で配給の食料のために骨身を削るより全然マシだな」

languages.text: « Ouais, faire le tour de la station en brûlant le petit peuple, c'est un boulot tranquille. C'est bien mieux que de se casser le dos sur les quais pour un quart de ration. »
languages.original_text: "Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."

traits.locale_text: « Ouais, faire le tour de la station en brûlant le petit peuple, c'est un boulot tranquille. C'est bien mieux que de se casser le dos sur les quais pour un quart de ration. »

languages.text: «Sí, pasearse por la estación quemando a rebeldes es un trabajo bastante agradable. Mucho mejor que romperte la espalda en las cubiertas por un cuarto de ración».
languages.original_text: "Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, pasearse por la estación quemando a rebeldes es un trabajo bastante agradable. Mucho mejor que romperte la espalda en las cubiertas por un cuarto de ración».

languages.text: "Tja, macht sicher Spaß, sich an der Station rumzudrücken und Gesocks zu verbrennen. Ist jedenfalls deutlich besser, als in den Docks für ein Viertel einer Ration zu buckeln."
languages.original_text: "Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."

traits.locale_text: "Tja, macht sicher Spaß, sich an der Station rumzudrücken und Gesocks zu verbrennen. Ist jedenfalls deutlich besser, als in den Docks für ein Viertel einer Ration zu buckeln."

languages.text: "Tabii ya! İstasyonda avare avare dolanıp ayaktakımını yakmak da iş mi? Çeyrek öğün için rıhtımda belini bükmekten kat kat daha iyi."
languages.original_text: "Yeah, strolling 'round the station burning rabble is a cosy old job. A far sight better than breaking your back at the docks for a quarter of a ration."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ya! İstasyonda avare avare dolanıp ayaktakımını yakmak da iş mi? Çeyrek öğün için rıhtımda belini bükmekten kat kat daha iyi."
